Package reqsimile.data

Class Summary
DBConnections DBConnections creates and saves all database connections.
DriverShim This is a shim class used as a workaround to enable dynamic loading of JDBC driver at runtime The workaround makes it possible to use a driver that is not in the classpath, nor in the jar.
InputFieldsTableModel InputFieldsTableModel is the table model for the tables in the settings dialog used for selecting which fields that are to be displayed in the summary and detail views, and be used for calculation.
PopulateRs PopulateRs is a thread that reads all the data from the database and populates the data sets from which the tables get their data to display.
PreProcessRs Preprocesses a requirement according to these steps: Tokenization, stemming and stop word removal of each requirement.
ReqData ReqData holds all the requirements data used.
ReqDataModel ReqDataModel is the middle layer between the actual data and a table in the user interface.
